...as royal fans celebrated the arrival of the newest heir, Princess Charlotte Elizabeth Diana.
Fourth in line to the British throne,...
...the newborn princess's name is seen as a tribute to Prince William's parents and grandmother.
I'm surprised, I thought it would be Alice.
And I didn't think they'd be allowed to use Diana but Charlotte sounds really nice.
